optuna
pytorch-lightning
einops

# Experimaestro

experimaestro < 0.11.0 ; python_version < "3.8"
datamaestro_text==2022.6.16 ; python_version < "3.8"

experimaestro > 1 ; python_version >= "3.8"
datamaestro >= 0.8.7
datamaestro_image >= 2020.9.25
datamaestro_ml >= 2020.9.25
datamaestro_text >= 2022.6.16 ; python_version >= "3.8"

# Hugging Face datasets library
datasets >= 2.7.0

transformers
